fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can always talk in every non-private channel.
- Your abilities can't be stopped by anything, no matter what.
- You can't whisper or be whispered to, because you're way too cool.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose someone each night. The next ability they use (including that night) won't be able to be stopped by anything, no matter what.
- Divebomb a player at night, dealing a Powerful attack to them. You may only do this once.
- Fly free during the day. You leave the game. If the game has ended by the start of the next day, you'll win. Otherwise, you'll lose.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang every criminal and evildoer, or escape the Town freely.
